name: Life's a Chore
description:
Manage your chores, fulfill your needs, stay sane for as long as you can.

This is my first ever game jam and whilst what I've come up with is a very simple game it was a lot of fun and I've learned a lot in the process. I hope you enjoy the end result and please feel free to leave me some feedback below. Enjoy!

For a challenge my highest score on the final build is 261 days...

Controls and Gameplay

Arrow Keys - Move.

Escape - Pause.

The aim of the game is to keep on top of your chores whilst tending to your needs. Chore objects will fill over time and you simply move over them to "do" the chore.

Needs are shown at the bottom of the screen and will slowly drain as they go unfulfilled. Interact with objects of the same colour in the house to refill them.

The large green yoga person is your sanity meter. When it runs out the game is over.

Stay sane for as long as you can!
